Your search for a reliable, quality, and affordable webhosting ends here. FrapHost.com always looks forward to offer budget and affordable webhosting solutions for the industry, while it is an economic way to go with fraphost.com, we keep our quality and reliability in tact.

We offer a lot more features in our packages with all the easy-to-use tools you need succeed. We also do security services for our clients, one of which is we monitor clients' accounts on a day to day basis to find any irregularities happening within the site, we then act on it as soon as possible to control the problem. We also offer a heroic 24/7/365 support, get a response in no time.

We give you assurance of most trust worthy, flawless, and reliable hosting platforms, to deliver you with stable, fast, smart, and best budget web hosting solutions and that our company performance will surely exceed your expectations. Our plans are made flexible and elastic to suit customer's needs. Our servers are housed on enterpise multicore hardware with multi peer connection in an ironclad data center and are at mutiple locations arcoss the USA. FHVS CUSTOM PLAN - TALK TO US!
Need a bigger/custom plan? No problem, just contact us using our pre-sales contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Please do check our announcements at http://fraphost.com/announcements.php to know what's happening inside fraphost. Please navigate through our site to see what advantages we have over other competitors.

[ Whopping Price Lock Guarantee ]
We are now offering our new Price Lock Guarantee on all accounts. What does this mean to you? Well this means that for as long as you are a customer with us, any plan you purchase will stay at that price for the length of your stay with us. We will never raise the price of your current plan, except if it was terminated, or you plan to upgrade/downgrade to another plan.

[ 99% Server Uptime Guarantee ]
We work hard to deal with unpredictable occurrences such as attacks, hardware issues, etc. Let's keep it real, there's really no such thing as 100% uptime guarantee, since there are many unpredictable threads such as DoS attacks, hardware issues, calamities that can strike our datacenter, and a lot more to mention. What we guarantee is our 99% Server Uptime.

[ 100% Satisfaction Guarantee ]
We are very confident that you will be satisfied, or better yet, delighted with our services, its because we offer you with almost everything and anything you need, from support assistance to providing you with all the easy-to-use tools you need to succeed.

[ The Network ]
United States, affords corporations with the ability to deploy high-density infrastructure services at an economical price. Relative to other parts of the United States (New York, Southern California), power rates are affordable in CC. As a result, colocating in CC can allow an enterprise to maintain a competitive advantage. Whether you rely on our highly skilled onsite team or make use of the facility's near walking distance proximity to Airport, hosting with us in USA is a smart choice.

With great routing to both East and West coasts, Level3 is the example of what it means to be Tier 1. Internap has also taken a deserved place in our network mix in CC, providing excellent routing and reliable low latency performance for all of North and South America. As always, our entire CC infrastructure relies solely on Cisco's Enterprise grade Catalyst lineup - ensuring your packets get delivered optimally.

- 68,000 Square Foot Building
- Internap and Level3 Connectivity
- SAS 70 Type II Audited Facility
- High Density Power

We provide you with the best services possible, on the fastest nodes ever, and still to mention our amazing team that handles all your support concerns. For anything and everything else related to our line of services, keep it with fraphost.com webhosting solutions.
